name: Blood Snow and Wolves
description:
It's been a long winter, and unfortunately you've just ran out of food. Grab your gun and dog and head out to hunt before you starve to death.

Controls:

wasd to move

mouse to aim

lmb to fire

F to feed someone

G to feed yourself

if you reach 5 hunger you die

if your family members reach 5 hunger they die

survival tips:

animals run away from gunshots, don't fire unless you have a target.

keep an eye out for the game trail, if you see footsteps, animals will be this way again eventually.

don't get lost, keep track of where you are relative to your cabin

if desperate, you can kill your dog and family for food

wolves will avoid you unless they're hungry, your dog will help scare them away, but gunshots will really scare them unless they're very hungry
